title: The God Only Corki Rant How to rise in this cancerous hell of a fking ranked ladder
body:
Watch yours games back, like ANY team or player from ANY sport in ANY country does to improve they watch themselves BACK, it's literally the single most important thing to improving in 90% of competitive sports, games, etc.

But I don't do it, cause oh wait, there's no replay system LOL, 11/10 rito would 9/11 again, "we are competitive game that supports eSports" KAPPA.

The only reason riot gives a flying fk about esports is because it keeps people addicted to their game with the hope of becoming pro and is the single most effective way of advertising to ever be conceived by any company in the history of gaming. Altho they didn't really invent it, but whatever, FK YOU RIOT. The funny thing is, Riot has morons that brain washed that they will read this and still believe that Riot actually cares about eSports, we are moving into the age where people spend more time talking online then in real life, online gaming will be a thing riot or not, yet they milk it like fking leeches and actually have the nerve to say they are doing this for eSports LOL. So Riot if you actually give a flying fk about eSports, then really you should automatically give everyone from level ONE access to every rune and a flawless replay system should be your number 1 priority, look at the runes every pro player uses, they have almost if not every single rune unlocked, 10 pages, and up to 3 or 4 pages just for a few champions put under slightly different situation, yet when you hit level 30, you wont even have enough IP for 2 solid rune pages worth of runes, if you have farm for hundreds of hours of game time just to get the fking runes to play at a competitive level LOOOOOOOOOL and fk all champions. /rantover
